root.name: Wasteland Angel
root.description: OverviewWasteland Angel is a Windows PC arcade shooter developed by Octane Games and Meridian4 and published by the latter.The game takes place in yet another post-apocalyptic setting, after World War III took place and wiped off most of the world’s population. Survivors live in fear of violent gangs, renegade military units and mutants.GameplayOn the wheel of a heavily armoured car with unlimited firepower, the game's Heroine (the titular Wasteland Angel) roams the radioactive wastes, trying to protect any survivors from being murdered or enslaved.In Wasteland Angel players will go up against waves of enemies and ultimately go head-on against fearsome end-level bosses. The game features a top-down isometric perspective and will have upgradeable weapons and ammo.PC System RequirementsOperating system: Windows® XP/Vista/7Processor: Intel® 2.0GHz CPURAM Memory: 2GBHard disk space: 4GBVideo Card: 256 MB of dedicated video memory with support for pixel shader 3.0. (nVidia 8600 or equivalent)Sound Card: Sound card with DirectX 9.0c supportDirectX®: 9.0c
